abstract: Steve Bartlett, the head of the Financial Services Roundtable, has played a pivotal role in lobbyists’ efforts to delay or water down financial regulatory changes.
snippet: Steve Bartlett, the head of the Financial Services Roundtable, has played a pivotal role in lobbyists’ efforts to delay or water down financial regulatory changes.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — An unexpected voice dominated a closed-door meeting a few months ago on Capitol Hill, where senior Senate aides were discussing the financial regulatory overhaul adopted last summer.

headline.main: Wall Street Lobbyist Aims to ‘Reform the Reform’

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
